articles.description: To celebrate Pi Day 2022, Instacart reveals the most popular pie in each state.
articles.content:
Pi Day 2022 is Monday, March 14. In honor of the celebration, same-day grocery delivery and pick-up platform, Instacart, served up some interesting purchase data.

articles.content:

articles.title: Amazon relocating 1800 employees out of downtown Seattle due to spiking crime - The Post Millennial

articles.content:
